According to a study by the Pew Research Center, online dating usage among young adults has nearly tripled since 2013. It also found that one-third of people who have used online dating have never actually gone on a date with someone they met on these platforms. This shows that online dating is not only a popular choice for meeting new people, but also a viable one for building meaningful relationships.
